titleStmt.title: Northern Bank of Kentucky Branch at Glasgow

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Northern Bank of Kentucky Branch at Glasgow

body.p: Branch of the Northern Bank of Kentucky located in Glasgow, Kentucky. Chartered by the Kentucky General Assembly on June 1, 1859. Seized by the Provisional Government of Kentucky in January 1862. Director(s): Thomas C. dinkinson. President(s): George W. Trabue. Cashier(s): Thomas J. Gorin.

ab.bibl:
The Biographical Encyclopaedia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century (Cincinnati, OH: J.M. Armstrong & Company, 1878), 390-91.
Stanton, Richard H., The Revised Statutes of Kentucky, Approved and Adopted by the General Assembly, 1851 and 1852, and in Force From July 1, 1852; with all the Amendments Subsequently Enacted. Volume II (Cincinnati, OH: Robert Clarke & Co, 1867), 500.
"The Bank Bill," Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), February 13, 1858, p. 1. J. Smith Homans, ed., The Bankers' Magazine, and Statistical Register, vol. XII (August 1862): 163.
The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1861 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1861), 38.
The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1864 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1864), 19.
